instructions: Heat butter in a pan over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and sauté until it turns golden brown.
Add the ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a few seconds.
Add the chopped tomato and cook until it turns soft and mushy.
Add the cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala, red chilli powder and turmeric powder. Mix well and cook for a few minutes.
Add the cubed paneer and mix well.
Add the cream and mix well.
Add salt to taste and mix well.
Cook for a few minutes until the gravy thickens.
Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot.
